channel.title: Black Mesa blood system for HL2
channel.description:
Really not sure if this should go in the cafeteria. I have no idea where or how to start looking for something like this, so a big description of what I want is how I'm going to go about this.
So you know the way the blood works in Black Mesa, getting it on your weapons, but mostly the way it looks when you kill people, pools on the ground, etc? I want that for standard Half Life 2. Does anyone know of a mod that might do this or similar?
